about_the_game:
World-building RPG "Minable & Create" is an easy-to-understand 2D screen sandbox game.



● Can be dug
Basically, anything in this world can be dug, broken, and materials can be obtained.
Collect wood, stone, leather, ore (iron, silver, gold)!
Because you can dig more and more in the sea or rocks, you can also create a geoglyph with the ground as a canvas.



● Can be created
The collected materials can be processed to create items, tools, weapons and armor.
The rarer the material, the stronger the effect.
Create your own village or town where you can place the found NPCs as friends!



● Can be connected
You can "publish" the world you created.
Please try to attract many people to your world.
You can enjoy it even more by playing and connecting with everyone.
* "Multiplayer function" is not implemented in the Early Access version [/]



● About "Demo version" [/]
→ In addition to "normal experience", "high Lv experience" is possible

【please note】
・ The world size of the demo version is only "512 squares x 512 squares".
・ In the demo version, status, belongings, placed terrain, buildings, etc. are not saved.
・ In the demo version, if you select "High Lv Experience", you can experience in the state of Lv75.
* Due to the high Lv effect, you can change the terrain and create items in a short time.

See below for detailed operation methods and tips for beginners
● Game help page

* You can check it by pressing the "F1 key" even in the game.

● Official page


Graphic material cooperation: (C) REFMAP, (C) finalbossblues

World-building RPG "Minable & Create" is an easy-to-understand 2D screen sandbox game.



● Can be dug
Basically, anything in this world can be dug, broken, and materials can be obtained.
Collect wood, stone, leather, ore (iron, silver, gold)!
Because you can dig more and more in the sea or rocks, you can also create a geoglyph with the ground as a canvas.



● Can be created
The collected materials can be processed to create items, tools, weapons and armor.
The rarer the material, the stronger the effect.
Create your own village or town where you can place the found NPCs as friends!



● Can be connected
You can "publish" the world you created.
Please try to attract many people to your world.
You can enjoy it even more by playing and connecting with everyone.

name: Minable & Create Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows8.1/10(64bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: World-building RPG "Minable & Create" is an easy-to-understand 2D screen sandbox game. Basically anything can be dug and you can create your own base with the acquired materials. Find and collect the people who were attacked by the Demon King and scattered, and save the world.
